title: Is custom skins allowed? Garen
body:
I don't know if this is allowed or not but still I do not own this or anything so no copyrights i just edit some shit
I smash 2 customs skins combine and got this https://mega.nz/#!g3hnkQDR!8FoLtmHdCIkRknbkk4n3zQpPKCJPX5Sf3vat_XJDG4w hopecha like

replies.body: We aren't currently banning for using custom skins, but that could change in the future.  In general, we don't support third party mods so we can't help if you run into issues or if your program has malicious content hiding within it.  Check out our[ 3rd party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and use extreme caution!
So im gonna get banned :( I been using this skin for aleast 14 months
He didn't say you'll get banned, so you don't have anything to worry about. Just keep yourself informed.
